content:
if anyone would like to sponsor Roc's development, you can now do that! :smiley:

Screen-Shot-2022-10-14-at-6.11.29-PM.png
all the donations go to the recently-created Roc Programming Language Foundation, which is a nonprofit charity
the plan for now is to use it exclusively to pay contributors, although someday we also may end up using it for other things (e.g. server costs, of which we don't currently have any)
so contributing will very directly fund Roc's development!
